meanings.definition: The quality of being brave or fearless.
meanings.sent1: Her courageousnesses in facing her fears inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers showed great courageousnesses in battle.
meanings.sent3: Despite being scared of heights, his courageousnesses kicked in when he climbed the mountain.
meanings.sent4: The courageousnesses of the firefighters battling the blaze was like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The courageousnesses of the young girl standing up to the bully was a shining example of bravery.

meanings.sent1: The courageousnesses displayed by the firefighters saved many lives.
meanings.sent2: His numerous courageousnesses in the face of danger earned him a medal.
meanings.sent3: The cat's courageousnesses in confronting the dog was both brave and foolish.
meanings.sent4: The courageousnesses of the marathon runners pushing through the pain was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The courageousnesses of the astronaut venturing into space was a testament to human spirit.
